item.title: Appsync Mock
item.description: Appsync Start the mock api service amplify mock api Sample mutation mutation MyMutation { createWebnavigation(input: {navpage: "sample", updatedAt: "2022"}) { navpage updatedAt } } Sample list query MyQuery { listWebnavigations { items { createdAt id navpage updatedAt } } } Testing with postman Create a POST REQUEST URL http://192.168.1.220:20002/graphql Add auth Key: x-api-key Value: ccccc 4. body (check graphql)
